title: Real Estate Admin
job_overview:
???? Rockstar Real Estate Virtual Assistant Wanted (Lead Generation, Appointment Setting, Admin Support)
Are you a detail-oriented, calm-under-pressure, and fast-learning Virtual Assistant with real estate experience?
We’re looking for a Real Estate VA with a dialer, excellent English, and strong admin/tech skills to help us scale our business by generating motivated seller leads, setting appointments, and managing data like a pro.

???? About the Role:
Find leads using websites like Zillow and other platforms and follow up with them. You’ll be the backbone of our lead generation efforts — talking to distressed property owners, gathering key property details, organizing information, and setting up appointments for in-person visits. This is an opportunity for a long-term, growth-oriented role in the real estate investment space.

???? Daily Responsibilities:
Call property owners using your dialer system

Use a proven script to qualify motivated sellers and distressed property owners

Collect property details:

Condition of the house, kitchen, roof, HVAC, and floors

Bed/Bath count, title status, and renovation history

Occupancy details and rent if applicable

Asking price, selling motivation, and ideal sale timeline

Best time for follow-up calls

Schedule appointments for property visits

Take detailed notes and enter data into the CRM

Conduct property research as needed

Send a daily report summarizing all calls, leads, and progress

???? Lead Types You’ll Be Calling:
Pre-foreclosure

Expired listings

Tax delinquent properties

FSBO (For Sale By Owner)

Absentee owners

Code violation properties

???? Soft Skills We’re Looking For:
EXCELLENT English (both written and spoken)

Calm and collected under pressure

Focused and detail-oriented

Fast learner and proactive problem solver

Organized and reliable

????? Basic Tech Skills Required:
Dialer system (you must have your own)

Microsoft Excel and Gmail

Google Docs, Sheets, and Calendar

Communication apps: Skype, WhatsApp, Telegram, FB Messenger, etc.

Project/task management using Google tools

???? Position Details:
Remote position (Work from anywhere)

Part-Time to Full-Time opportunity

Long-term with performance-based incentives

Daily communication and reporting expected

???? Ready to Apply?
Send us the following:

Your updated resume

A short voice recording introducing yourself

A quick note on why you’re a great fit for this role

Confirm you have access to your own dialer system

What is the answer to 10+10? Put the answer in the subject when applying. Thank you
